Html:
Hi, I'm quite excited about the prospects of this designer. I've created by hand a fairly complex configuration section and am trying to rebuild it in csd. I have validators set on some of my elements. How do I set a validator on an attribute with csd?

Thanks Scott

spascoe64 wrote:
Hi, I'm quite excited about the prospects of this designer. I've created by hand a fairly complex configuration section and am trying to rebuild it in csd. I have validators set on some of my elements. How do I set a validator on an attribute with csd?

Thanks Scott


It's currently not yet possible to add validators, I'm afraid. I expected the question to come up - just not this soon :-)

I'll make it a work item for a next release. I'll be putting up the source code soon, and I was hoping other people would want to contribute to add features like this, so maybe you would like to help out?
This discussion has been copied to a work item. Click here to go to the work item and continue the discussion.
